data.name: Code Workshop Halloween Party 2019
data.description: Join us for our annual Halloween party when the spirits come out to code. Costumes not required, but always appreciated. Celebrate with lightning talks, a Halloweenn hackathon with great prizes, and Open Source Trick-or-Treat goodies and awesome food.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: GDG DevFest Modesto & Berkeley
relatedRecords.description: Hey GDGers, we know October is a long ways out, but we’re super excited to bring you the first DevFest to be hosted in Modesto (and our second partnering with GDG Berkeley)! Location is TBD, but the date will be October 19, 2019 so mark your calendars now and get ready for a day full of awesome tech…

relatedRecords.name: SharePoint Saturday New York City 2020
relatedRecords.description: Administrators, end-users, architects, developers, and other professionals that work with Microsoft Collaboration or Cloud Technologies will meet to share the latest information for working with SharePoint, Microsoft365, the Power Platform and related offerings from Microsoft.
